meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Schlatter Wren Allen Sam Scovill Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7431.

td.p: Stephanie Schlatter, a stay-at-home parent from Toledo, Ohio
Wren Allen, a botanical artist from Santa Fe, New Mexico
Sam Scovill, a G.I.S. technician from Oklahoma City, Oklahoma (whose 3-day cash winnings total $56,201)

tr.td: GRAND MARSHALS OF THE ROSE PARADE
LITERARY TERMS
ON "EDGE"
PICK YOUR BATTLE
MORE THAN AN ATHLETE
YOU'RE THE BALM
